description.translate: All that remains are relics of the old traditions.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Botte du premier enfant\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il ne reste plus que des reliques\"}","{\"text\":\"§7des vielles traditions.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7All that remains are relics\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of the old traditions.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
